content: I had a really bad night last night, first one in months. I pretty much kept to myself all day, then went to bed early & just cried and cried. It's so weird, the closer it gets to hubby coming home, the MORE I miss him! Strange thing is: He told me today, when we chatted, that this morning he woke up about 5am (his time), and couldn't figure out why, but wanted to get to a phone to call and check on me. I thought that was totally creepy!! Any of y'all ever have something like that happen, with a spouse or loved one??
reply: I had a really bad night last night, first one in months. I pretty much kept to myself all day, then went to bed early & just cried and cried. title: Anyone ever have this happen???

content: There are realms we know not of that are woven tight around us. Though our brain may not fathom them, our senses touch them. Love is the strongest bond in the Universe and creates that harmony and sense, especially for women, between them and the ones they wish to protect - You reached out with intense feeling and your loved one felt it - as natural as Sun, Moon, and Earth always leaning towards each other - ahey Wandering and Wondering

content: DH and I have that all the time... The more apart from eachother you are, the more you want to reach out and touch them, and there are times that the universe folds just enough for your auras to touch. It's a wonderful thing and means that you too have a very strong bond... do all you can to keep that bond.

content: mfamily2004: It is true what DSTremf said: "There are things ... that go on in this universe which sciense and religion are not able to grasp" ... and I'd add "explain". There are too many true stories about things like 'what you've experienced' that are recorded and be proven. I believe there is one such story about someone on the Titanic. Their loved one, in the US, woke in the night not knowing why but felt the urge to pray for their loved one at the exact same time the Titanic was going down. The person on the Titanic survived. I heard a missionary tell such a story about finding a snake coiled near their sleeping child in India. The grand parents in the US felt the need to pray for their grand child. The snake left before the child woke up. Weeks later they each wrote letters telling of their experiences, giving the exact date and time ... and sure enough they were at the exact same 'time in reality' while being hours (on the clock) different. I could tell ya bout an experience my wife and I had when I was at Fort Knox and she was on a retreat in Ohio, back in 1967 ... but it's too long of a story to tell here. You experienced it! You can believe it! You can call it what you wish! It happens all the time ... I believe more than we will ever know People have a hard time talking about these kind of things because those who 'don't believe in it' or have never experienced 'it' look at ya like you are a UFO nut. Thank you for sharing and being so open about it. armywife said it best: "... do all you can to keep that bond. "

content: Easy Explanation! The Great Planner (IMHO God) knows when it is best to intervene. After over a decade of providing Military Honors and other related activities; I have leared there are no real 'coincidences' i.e. Bald Eagles circling low over a flag draped casket; rain and wind stopping moments before a funeral procession arrives and resuming within minutes after the service; being in the newspaper office when a Veteran's grieving widow or child brings in an obituary; and on and on!
reply: Easy Explanation! The Great Planner (IMHO God) knows when it is best to intervene. content: I have experienced some of those types of events also. But most of them I keep to myself. Sometimes it is best to just believe and understand. The Lord looks out for those who believe in HIM. And keeps the door open for everyone else. One I will share is one that happened while on active duty. It is strange but true. It happened while I was getting ready to transfer from my command. I was an IS and as an IS I had to work with classified info. Well, I had to inventory everything I had checked out from the SSO. Well, there was one piece of classified info that I just couldn't find. I looked and looked but just couldn't find it. One night I had a dream and in that dream it showed me where that item was. Well, on a whim I decided to check it out, never can tell you know. Well I looked in the place where I dreamt it was and it was there!! Wow, it sure saved me from making little rocks out of big ones. Now there is a strange tale.
